article.title: Missile Defense Agency Modifies Raytheon Radar Contract for More Than $189 Million
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Missile Defense Agency recently announced the award of a contract modification of more than $189 million to Raytheon Company Integrated Defense Systems, Woburn, Massachusetts.Â Under this modification, Raytheon will fabricate AN/TPY-2 radar #8.
